item.title: Crack Addicts
item.description: Is there any other phrase to describe the mobile operators? From Vodafone’s rip-off hamstrung data plans to the O2’s Paddy Tax on the iPhone, they’d take money from a baby to keep their unsustainable ARPUs up. “Hey Baby Phones! No-one has done baby phones. That’s an untapped demographic. We could coat the phones in sugar.” Supposedly these operators know our business and their own. I guess that explains iMode. But perhaps they are getting a clue?
